name: The Living Dead Returns
description:
You are a captain of a special forces squad of your country's special forces. A terrorist organization attacks the capital city and then releases a deadly toxin. The military forces sent to fight the terrorist were turned into zombies because of this gas. The rest of your team is in a helicopter surrounded by zombies. They are waiting for you to come so that they can get away. The helicopter is between two of the tallest towers in the city and they have started fires on the roof of these towers to signal you. You need to hurry for time is running out and the airforce conduct an airstrike at any moment.

Controls:-

  • 'W' to move forward.
  • 'A' to move left.
  • 'S' to move backward.
  • 'D' to move right.
  • 'Left Shift' to sprint.
  • 'Left Click' to shoot.
  • 'Right Click' to toggle aim.
  • 'Mouse Scroll Wheel' to change weapon.
  • Number keys 1 - 5 to change weapon (located on the top of the keyboard).
  • '9' on the top of the keyboard to pause and play.

In this  game there are 5 different guns.

  1. Pistol - It has high stability, a medium range, low damage and slow firing rate.
  2. Shotgun - It has the least stability, a very short range, very high damage and very slow firing rate. 
  3. SMG/Carbine - It has low stability, medium range, least damage and highest firing rate.
  4. Assault Rifle - It has moderate stability, long range, medium damage and high firing rate.
  5. Sniper Rifle - It has the highest stability, longest range, high damage and the slowest firing rate.

There are 6 types of pickups. 4 of them are used as ammunition. The other 2 are the Med kit and battery  pickup.

  1. Bullets . This ammo is very common. It is used in the carbine and in the pistol. One pickup gives 20 bullets.
  2. Rounds . This is common. This type of ammo is only used in the assault rifle. Each pickup gives 10 rounds.
  3. Cartridges. This is the 2nd rarest type of ammo. It is used in the Sniper rifle. Every pickup gives 5 cartridges.
  4. Shells. This is the rarest type of ammo.  It is used in the shotgun. Each pickup gives 5 shells .
  5. Battery. This is an uncommon type of pickup. It increases the lifetime of the torch. It helps spot zombies in dark corners
  6. Med kit. This is the last and rarest pickup in the game.  Each pickup gives 25 health. 
  7. These pickups are common near burning vehicles.

ENEMIES                                                                                                                                                                        In this game the zombies are faster than before. They can be found in large groups or solo in dark places. They usually are found away from burning buildings. They have no long ranged attacks but instead use razor sharp claws to strike you in close range. They can be very dangerous in groups. If you kill zombies it is highly likely that you will find some loot nearby. As you get closer to your objective you will find more zombies.

YOUR OBJECTIVE

Your objective in this game is to first locate 2 of the tallest buildings in the city. There roof will be on fire. You have to head towards these buildings and reach a helicopter between them to win the game.

The game might lag a bit or even hang. This is because your internet bandwidth might not be good enough to play the game on the browser. I that case you can download the additional downloadable files that are there.

Good luck and and have fun playing!
